title: Fragment Of A Medallion, 5th–8th century
medium:
Medium: warp; S-spun, Z-twist linen. Wefts; s-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping
description: Bottom part of a larger medallion showing two addorsed riders looking back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment Of A Medallion, 5th–8th century.
5th–8th century. Medium: warp; S-spun, Z-twist linen. Wefts; s-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-132.
